description: Hungry for sex, Mark Andrews finds club attendant Danny Somers cleaning up one of the play areas and fills Danny's eager and hungry mouth full of cock.  Turned on by the scene, Matt Gunther and Brad Mitchell work themselves in.  The four square off in true sex club group sex fashion.  Brad heads back to work only to find his trick from the other night falling head of heels for him...again.
title: Mandriven, Scene #05
